channel.title: NYS:NYT on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:NYT on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Activist Investor Fivespan Takes Stake in New York Times
item.description: The financiers that led a high-profile activist campaign at the New York Times Co. three years ago have now taken a stake in the iconic newspaper company via their new investment firm.
